sqls.sql: select * from AT_INT_PLM_MIXMIX where 1=1 <#if act_code_i??> and Act_Code_I=:act_code_i </#if> <#if changed_by_s??> and CHANGED_BY_S=:changed_by_s </#if> <#if changed_time_t??> and CHANGED_TIME_T=:changed_time_t </#if> <#if coolspeed_mix_d??> and CoolSpeed_Mix_D=:coolspeed_mix_d </#if> <#if data_source_s??> and DATA_SOURCE_S=:data_source_s </#if> <#if data_source_type_s??> and DATA_SOURCE_TYPE_S=:data_source_type_s </#if> <#if degrad_allow_s??> and DEGRAD_ALLOW_S=:degrad_allow_s </#if> <#if degrad_weight_s??> and DEGRAD_WEIGHT_S=:degrad_weight_s </#if> <#if dummy1_s??> and Dummy1_S=:dummy1_s </#if> <#if dummy2_s??> and Dummy2_S=:dummy2_s </#if> <#if dummy3_s??> and Dummy3_S=:dummy3_s </#if> <#if dummy4_s??> and Dummy4_S=:dummy4_s </#if> <#if dummy5_s??> and Dummy5_S=:dummy5_s </#if> <#if guid_s??> and GUID_S=:guid_s </#if> <#if id_s??> and ID_S=:id_s </#if> <#if mix_id_i??> and Mix_id_I=:mix_id_i </#if> <#if openequip_id_i??> and OpenEquip_ID_I=:openequip_id_i </#if> <#if openmixspeed_mix_d??> and OpenMixSpeed_Mix_D=:openmixspeed_mix_d </#if> <#if receive_time_t??> and RECEIVE_TIME_T=:receive_time_t </#if> <#if recipe_code_s??> and RECIPE_CODE_S=:recipe_code_s </#if> <#if record_flag_s??> and RECORD_FLAG_S=:record_flag_s </#if> <#if rollor_mix_d??> and Rollor_Mix_D=:rollor_mix_d </#if> <#if rubtemp_mix_d??> and RubTemp_Mix_D=:rubtemp_mix_d </#if> <#if set_press_d??> and Set_Press_D=:set_press_d </#if> <#if set_rota_d??> and Set_Rota_D=:set_rota_d </#if> <#if set_enter_d??> and Set_enter_D=:set_enter_d </#if> <#if set_power_d??> and Set_power_D=:set_power_d </#if> <#if set_temp_d??> and Set_temp_D=:set_temp_d </#if> <#if set_time_d??> and Set_time_D=:set_time_d </#if> <#if speeddiff_mix_d??> and SpeedDiff_Mix_D=:speeddiff_mix_d </#if> <#if term_code_d??> and Term_Code_D=:term_code_d </#if> <#if watrtemp_mix_d??> and WatrTemp_Mix_D=:watrtemp_mix_d </#if> <#if sort??&&order??> order by ${sort} ${order} <#else> order by atr_key desc </#if>
